scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf build && rm -rf ./server/deployments.json && rm -rf ./client/src/deployments.json
scripts.dapp: cd client && npm install && npm start
scripts.ganache: ganache-cli -m 'spirit supply whale amount human item harsh scare congress discover talent hamster' --allowUnlimitedContractSize  -l 0x1fffffffffffff -e 100000 -a 50
